languages.text: "Здесь нет нужды в откровениях от Неумирающего. Для того, кто всю жизнь посвятил постижению Завета Паутины, язык смерти яснее слов. Кровь пишет летопись последнего часа, и в ней все ответы. Она говорит со мной, может рассказать, каким орудием ее пролили. Что чувствовал ее хозяин — бился ли в страхе или был холоден как сталь клинка. В какой миг и как оборвалась нить. Для ткача нет двух одинаковых ран, и каждая алая капля несет послание от Неумирающего".

traits.locale_text: "Для того, кто всю жизнь посвятил постижению Завета Паутины, язык смерти яснее слов. Кровь пишет летопись последнего часа, и в ней все ответы. Каким орудием нанесли удар. Какие страсти двигали убийцей. В какой миг и как оборвалась нить. Для ткача нет двух одинаковых ран, и каждая алая капля несет послание от Неумирающего".

languages.text: "There is no need for revelations from the Undying Emperor here. For one who has dedicated their life to understanding the Tenets of the Web, death speaks a language clearer than any words. Blood writes the chronicle of the final hour, and it holds all the answers. It speaks to me. It can tell me with what instrument it was spilt. What its owner felt — whether they struggled in terror or were as cold as the steel of a blade. At what moment and how the thread snapped. For a spinner, no two wounds are alike, and each scarlet drop carries a message from the Undying One."
languages.original_text: "Здесь нет нужды в откровениях от Неумирающего. Для того, кто всю жизнь посвятил постижению Завета Паутины, язык смерти яснее слов. Кровь пишет летопись последнего часа, и в ней все ответы. Она говорит со мной, может рассказать, каким орудием ее пролили. Что чувствовал ее хозяин — бился ли в страхе или был холоден как сталь клинка. В какой миг и как оборвалась нить. Для ткача нет двух одинаковых ран, и каждая алая капля несет послание от Неумирающего".

traits.locale_text: "There is no need for revelations from the Undying Emperor here. For one who has dedicated their life to understanding the Tenets of the Web, death speaks a language clearer than any words. Blood writes the chronicle of the final hour, and it holds all the answers. It speaks to me. It can tell me with what instrument it was spilt. What its owner felt — whether they struggled in terror or were as cold as the steel of a blade. At what moment and how the thread snapped. For a spinner, no two wounds are alike, and each scarlet drop carries a message from the Undying One."

"This is an art I have been learning since I young, Enim'{name}. To understand what kind of weapon leaves splashes on the walls like a scattering of stars in the sky, and what kind of weapon crosses them out in oblique streaks. To notice the difference between the trace left by a skilful hand and the trace left by an unskilful one. To distinguish by smell and taste to whom the blood once belonged... Yes. I figured it out after looking around for a while."

"There is no need for revelations from the Undying Emperor here. For one who has dedicated their life to understanding the Tenets of the Web, death speaks a language clearer than any words. Blood writes the chronicle of the final hour, and it holds all the answers. It speaks to me. It can tell me with what instrument it was spilt. What its owner felt — whether they struggled in terror or were as cold as the steel of a blade. At what moment and how the thread snapped. For a spinner, no two wounds are alike, and each scarlet drop carries a message from the Undying One."

"This is an art I have been learning since I young, Enim'{name}, one to help me understand what kind of weapon leaves splashes on the walls like a spattering of stars in the sky, and what kind of weapon crosses them out in oblique streaks; to notice the difference between the trace left by a skilled hand and that left by an unskilled one; to distinguish by smell and taste the blood's original owner... Yes. After looking around a little, I was able to figure it out."

"There is no need for revelations from the Undying Emperor here. For one who has dedicated their life to understanding the Tenets of the Web, death speaks a language clearer than any words. Blood writes the chronicle of the final hour, and it holds all the answers. It speaks to me. It can tell me with what instrument it was spilt. What its owner felt — whether they struggled in terror or were as cold as the steel of a blade. At what moment and how the thread snapped. For a spinner, no two wounds are alike, and each scarlet drop carries a message from the Undying One."

For a spinner, no two wounds are alike, and each scarlet drop carries a message from the Undying One."

"There is no need for revelations from the Undying Emperor here. For one who has dedicated their life to understanding the Tenets of the Web, death speaks a language clearer than any words. Blood writes the chronicle of the final hour, and it holds all the answers. It speaks to me. It can tell me with what instrument it was spilt. What its owner felt — whether they struggled in terror or were as cold as the steel of a blade. At what moment and how the thread snapped. For a spinner, no two wounds are alike, and each scarlet drop carries a message from the Undying One."

languages.text: "Wir brauchen hier keine Offenbarungen des Todlosen Imperators. Für jemanden, der sein Leben in den Dienst der Grundsätze des Netzes gestellt hat, sagt die Sprache des Todes mehr als tausend Worte. Blut schreibt die Chronik unserer letzten Stunde und birgt alle Antworten. Es spricht zu mir. Es kann mir sagen, mit welchen Instrument es vergossen wurde. Was sein Besitzer fühlte ... ob er voller Angst oder kalt wie der Stahl seiner Klinge war. Wann und wie der Faden durchtrennt wurde. Für einen Spinner gleicht keine Wunde der anderen und jeder Tropfen Blut birgt eine Botschaft des Todlosen."
languages.original_text: "There is no need for revelations from the Undying Emperor here. For one who has dedicated their life to understanding the Tenets of the Web, death speaks a language clearer than any words. Blood writes the chronicle of the final hour, and it holds all the answers. It speaks to me. It can tell me with what instrument it was spilt. What its owner felt — whether they struggled in terror or were as cold as the steel of a blade. At what moment and how the thread snapped. For a spinner, no two wounds are alike, and each scarlet drop carries a message from the Undying One."

Was sein Besitzer fühlte ... ob er voller Angst oder kalt wie der Stahl seiner Klinge war. Wann und wie der Faden durchtrennt wurde. Für einen Spinner gleicht keine Wunde der anderen und jeder Tropfen Blut birgt eine Botschaft des Todlosen."

languages.text: «Aquí no necesitamos las revelaciones del Emperador Inmortal. Para quien ha dedicado su vida a entender la Doctrina de la Red, la muerte habla con más claridad que las palabras. La sangre escribe la crónica del momento final y contiene todas las respuestas. Me habla. Puede decirme qué instrumento la derramó. Lo que sintió su dueño: si luchó aterrado o si mantuvo la frialdad del acero afilado. En qué momento se rompió su hilo. Para los tejedores, no hay dos heridas iguales, y cada gota escarlata porta un mensaje del Inmortal».
languages.original_text: "There is no need for revelations from the Undying Emperor here. For one who has dedicated their life to understanding the Tenets of the Web, death speaks a language clearer than any words. Blood writes the chronicle of the final hour, and it holds all the answers. It speaks to me. It can tell me with what instrument it was spilt. What its owner felt — whether they struggled in terror or were as cold as the steel of a blade. At what moment and how the thread snapped. For a spinner, no two wounds are alike, and each scarlet drop carries a message from the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: «Aquí no necesitamos las revelaciones del Emperador Inmortal. Para quien ha dedicado su vida a entender la Doctrina de la Red, la muerte habla con más claridad que las palabras. La sangre escribe la crónica del momento final y contiene todas las respuestas. Me habla. Puede decirme qué instrumento la derramó. Lo que sintió su dueño: si luchó aterrado o si mantuvo la frialdad del acero afilado. En qué momento se rompió su hilo. Para los tejedores, no hay dos heridas iguales, y cada gota escarlata porta un mensaje del Inmortal».

languages.text: 「ここで不死の皇帝からの啓示をうける必要はありません。ウェブの教義の理解に人生をかけてきた者にとって、死はどのような言葉より明白に語るのです。血は最期の時の記録を書き留め、すべての答えを握っている。それが語りかけてくるのです。どんな武器によって散らされたのか。その持ち主がどんな感じだったのか…恐怖からあらがったのか、それとも刃物のように冷たかったのか。どの瞬間に、どんなふうに糸が切れたのか。織り手にとって、二つと同じ傷はありません。そして緋色のしずく一滴一滴が、不死の者からのメッセージを運ぶのです」
languages.original_text: "There is no need for revelations from the Undying Emperor here. For one who has dedicated their life to understanding the Tenets of the Web, death speaks a language clearer than any words. Blood writes the chronicle of the final hour, and it holds all the answers. It speaks to me. It can tell me with what instrument it was spilt. What its owner felt — whether they struggled in terror or were as cold as the steel of a blade. At what moment and how the thread snapped. For a spinner, no two wounds are alike, and each scarlet drop carries a message from the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: 「ここで不死の皇帝からの啓示をうける必要はありません。ウェブの教義の理解に人生をかけてきた者にとって、死はどのような言葉より明白に語るのです。血は最期の時の記録を書き留め、すべての答えを握っている。それが語りかけてくるのです。どんな武器によって散らされたのか。その持ち主がどんな感じだったのか…恐怖からあらがったのか、それとも刃物のように冷たかったのか。どの瞬間に、どんなふうに糸が切れたのか。織り手にとって、二つと同じ傷はありません。そして緋色のしずく一滴一滴が、不死の者からのメッセージを運ぶのです」

languages.text: “这样的状况并不需要不死神皇的启示。我的毕生精力都用来理解织血罗网的教义，对我而言，死亡比任何话语都更能说明问题。鲜血记录了最终时刻的真相，包含了一切答案。鲜血会对我开口，告诉我是什么样的武器挥洒了鲜血；告诉我死者的感受，是在恐惧中挣扎，还是像刀刃一样冰冷；告诉我丝线是什么时候被割断的，是如何被割断的。在织网者眼中，每个伤口都截然不同，承载着不死之神传达的信息。”
languages.original_text: "There is no need for revelations from the Undying Emperor here. For one who has dedicated their life to understanding the Tenets of the Web, death speaks a language clearer than any words. Blood writes the chronicle of the final hour, and it holds all the answers. It speaks to me. It can tell me with what instrument it was spilt. What its owner felt — whether they struggled in terror or were as cold as the steel of a blade. At what moment and how the thread snapped. For a spinner, no two wounds are alike, and each scarlet drop carries a message from the Undying One."

traits.locale_text: “这样的状况并不需要不死神皇的启示。我的毕生精力都用来理解织血罗网的教义，对我而言，死亡比任何话语都更能说明问题。鲜血记录了最终时刻的真相，包含了一切答案。鲜血会对我开口，告诉我是什么样的武器挥洒了鲜血；告诉我死者的感受，是在恐惧中挣扎，还是像刀刃一样冰冷；告诉我丝线是什么时候被割断的，是如何被割断的。在织网者眼中，每个伤口都截然不同，承载着不死之神传达的信息。”

languages.text: « Nul besoin de révélations de l'Immortel dans les circonstances actuelles. Pour quelqu'un qui a consacré sa vie à la compréhension des Préceptes de la Toile, la mort parle une langue plus claire que les mots. Le sang retrace la chronique de la dernière heure, et il détient toutes les réponses. Il me parle. Il me dit avec quel instrument il a été versé. Ce que la victime a ressenti, si elle s'est débattue dans les affres de la terreur ou si elle s'est montrée aussi froide que l'acier d'une lame. Quand et comment le fil a été tranché. Pour un tisseur, il n'est pas deux blessures qui se ressemblent, et chaque goutte écarlate porte en elle un message de l'Immortel. »
languages.original_text: "There is no need for revelations from the Undying Emperor here. For one who has dedicated their life to understanding the Tenets of the Web, death speaks a language clearer than any words. Blood writes the chronicle of the final hour, and it holds all the answers. It speaks to me. It can tell me with what instrument it was spilt. What its owner felt — whether they struggled in terror or were as cold as the steel of a blade. At what moment and how the thread snapped. For a spinner, no two wounds are alike, and each scarlet drop carries a message from the Undying One."

Le sang retrace la chronique de la dernière heure, et il détient toutes les réponses. Il me parle. Il me dit avec quel instrument il a été versé. languages.text: "Burada Ölmeyen İmparator'un vahiylerine gerek yok. Hayatını Ağ'ın İlkeleri'ni anlamaya adayanlar için ölüm, tüm kelimelerden daha anlaşılır bir dilde konuşur. Kan, son saatlerde yaşananları yazar ve tüm soruların cevaplarını saklar. Kan benimle konuşur. Onu döken aracın ne olduğunu bana söyleyebilir. Sahibinin hissettiklerini, dehşetle mi boğuştuğunu yoksa kılıcın çeliği kadar soğuk bir yüreğe mi sahip olduğunu, ipliğin tam ne zaman ve nasıl koptuğunu anlatabilir. Bir dokur için hiçbir yara diğerine benzemez. Her bir kızıl damla, Ölmeyen'den bir mesaj taşır."
languages.original_text: "There is no need for revelations from the Undying Emperor here. For one who has dedicated their life to understanding the Tenets of the Web, death speaks a language clearer than any words. Blood writes the chronicle of the final hour, and it holds all the answers. It speaks to me. It can tell me with what instrument it was spilt. What its owner felt — whether they struggled in terror or were as cold as the steel of a blade. At what moment and how the thread snapped. For a spinner, no two wounds are alike, and each scarlet drop carries a message from the Undying One."
